remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建議您使用 類別與 方法來建立 執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 如此可讓您充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所推出的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 網路上的 XML 文件使用不同的 W3C 標準包含機制進行彙總的資料區塊所組成，並因此會包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 實體就是一個例子，但這並不限於使用 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基底 URI 會告訴您這些節點的來源。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 是否要傳回的節點沒有基底 URI （例如，它們已從字串中剖析記憶體中），會傳回 String.Empty。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下列範例會剖析檔案，並顯示每個節點的基底 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each of the nodes. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建議您使用 類別與 方法來建立 執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 如此可讓您充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所推出的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 這個方法內容串流、 解碼 Base64 內容，並傳回已解碼二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以連續呼叫這個方法來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 第一個：機制來指定及描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). > [!NOTE] > 您不應該存取的任何呼叫之間的讀取器屬性方法，直到這個方法傳回值 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 這個方法有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 當它到達它正在操作的位元組資料流結尾時，會傳回 0 值。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 讀取器定位於第一個非內容節點上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您尋求更少，或超過會留在資料流讀取位元組的確切數目，會保留在其目前的位置。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 不支援下列的 XML 節點類型：項目，xml 宣告，None、 文件，DocumentType、 標記法、 實體、 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, DocumentFragment.

span.span: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建議您使用 類別與 方法來建立 執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 如此可讓您充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所推出的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 這個方法內容串流、 解碼 BinHex 內容，並傳回已解碼二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 BinHex 編碼 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method streams the content, decodes the BinHex content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline BinHex encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以連續呼叫這個方法來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. > [!NOTE] > 您不應該存取的任何呼叫之間的讀取器屬性方法，直到這個方法傳回值 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 這個方法有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 當它到達它正在操作的位元組資料流結尾時，會傳回 0 值。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 讀取器定位於第一個非內容節點上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您尋求更少，或超過會留在資料流讀取位元組的確切數目，會保留在其目前的位置。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 不支援下列的 XML 節點類型：項目，xml 宣告，None、 文件，DocumentType、 標記法、 實體、 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, DocumentFragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建議您使用 類別與 方法來建立 執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 如此可讓您充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所推出的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 這個方法讀取內容、 使用 Base64 編碼方式，將其解碼，並傳回已解碼二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。This method reads the content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 第一個：機制來指定及描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 這個方法只能讀取簡單內容項目。This method can only read simple-content elements. 元素可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段中，註解和處理指示。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 項目不能有子項目。The element cannot have child elements. 此方式非常類似於方法，但它只能在項目節點型別上呼叫。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果計數值高於在文件中的位元組數目，或者它是否等於在文件中的位元組數目讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。If the count value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下列節點。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the node. 如果您呼叫會使用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能彷彿已在使用第一次的內容，然後呼叫方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 這表示讀取器讀取的所有文字，直到遇到結束的項目。This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered. 接著會讀取結束標記 節點中，讀取下一個節點，並接著將本身置於下一個後續節點。It then reads the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node. ## Examples 請參閱若要查看使用此方法的範例。See to see an example using this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建議您使用 類別與 方法來建立 執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 如此可讓您充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所推出的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 如果置於項目，`ReadString`串連所有文字、 顯著泛空白字元、 泛空白字元和 CData 區段節點類型，並傳回串連的資料，做為項目內容。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CData section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 它會停止時遇到任何標記。It stops when any markup is encountered. 這可能會發生於混合內容模型中，或是讀取項目結束標記時。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果類似文字的節點上，位於`ReadString`加入項目結束標記中，執行從文字節點的相同串連。If positioned on a text-like node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果讀取器定位於屬性文字節點上，則 `ReadString` 具有相同的功能，就像讀取器定位於項目開始標記上一樣。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它會傳回所有串連的項目文字節點。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個元素的文字內容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements.
